titleStmt.title: Epicedium, a funerall song, vpon the vertuous life, and godly death, of the right vvorshipfull the Lady Helen Branch
titleStmt.author: Hervey of Kidbrooke, William Hervey, Baron, d. 1642.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Hervey, Baron Hervey of Kidbrooke.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
